channel.title: Mopar ip change?
channel.description: I've changed my ip on my server due to server switch. is there any way to change the ip for the Mopar server list instead of making a whole new account... ? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Mopar ip change?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“wolfservers, post:1, topic:546530”]I’ve changed my ip on my server due to server switch. is there any way to change the ip for the Mopar server list instead of making a whole new account… ?
Thanks in advance.[/quote]
Yeah, you can ask Moparisthebest nicely to change your server’s old IP to the new one.
Alternatively you can wait for it’s online percentage to drop below 40%, and it will be removed from the list automatically. You then can resubmit.

Read full topic
